snippet: Home opener hoopla was no distraction at all for Michael Wacha. Neither was the 49-degree chill for the first pitch....

headline.print_headline: Wacha Pitches Cards Past Reds 5-3 in Home Opener
headline.main: Wacha Pitches Cards Past Reds 5-3 in Home Opener

lead_paragraph: Home opener hoopla was no distraction at all for Michael Wacha. Neither was the 49-degree chill for the first pitch.
